attacks_and_spellcasting.name: Sacred Flame
attacks_and_spellcasting.notes: DEX save DC 15, no cover benefit. Cantrip.

attacks_and_spellcasting.name: Guiding Bolt
attacks_and_spellcasting.notes: Next attack against target has advantage. 1st level spell.

features_and_traits.name: Disciple of Life
features_and_traits.description: Your healing spells are more effective. Whenever you use a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

features_and_traits.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
features_and_traits.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and evoke healing energy that can restore a number of hit points equal to five times your cleric level. Choose any creatures within 30 feet of you, and divide those hit points among them. This feature can restore a creature to no more than half of its hit point maximum. You can't use this feature on an undead or a construct.

features_and_traits.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
features_and_traits.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead. Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

features_and_traits.name: Destroy Undead
features_and_traits.description: When an undead fails its saving throw against your Turn Undead feature, the creature is instantly destroyed if its challenge rating is at or below 1/2.

features_and_traits.name: Blessed Healer
features_and_traits.description: The healing spells you cast on others heal you as well. When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that restores hit points to a creature other than you, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

features_and_traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
features_and_traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

features_and_traits.name: Stonecunning
features_and_traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

equipment.name: Warhammer
equipment.description: A sturdy dwarven-forged hammer emblazoned with the symbol of Moradin.

equipment.name: Shield
equipment.description: A steel shield bearing the holy symbol of Moradin, the Dwarven god of creation.

equipment.name: Chain Mail
equipment.description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings.

equipment.name: Holy Symbol of Moradin
equipment.description: An ornate silver amulet depicting Moradin's hammer and anvil. Used as a spellcasting focus.

equipment.name: Healer's Kit
equipment.description: Contains 10 uses of bandages and salves for stabilizing dying creatures.

equipment.name: Prayer Book
equipment.description: A well-worn book of prayers, hymns, and religious texts dedicated to Moradin.

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

cantrips.name: Spare the Dying
cantrips.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable.

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

level_1.name: Cure Wounds
level_1.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
level_1.at_higher_levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

level_1.name: Bless
level_1.components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
level_1.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.
level_1.at_higher_levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

level_1.name: Healing Word
level_1.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

level_1.name: Shield of Faith
level_1.components: V, S, M (a small parchment with holy text)
level_1.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

level_2.name: Spiritual Weapon
level_2.description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier force damage.

level_2.name: Lesser Restoration
level_2.description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

level_2.name: Prayer of Healing
level_2.description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

level_3.name: Revivify
level_3.target: One creature that died within 1 minute
level_3.components: V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp, consumed)
level_3.description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

level_3.name: Mass Healing Word
level_3.description: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

level_3.name: Beacon of Hope
level_3.description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws, and regains the maximum number of hit points possible from any healing.
